response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us, but we're confident it could be an exceptional addition to your collection or business. We're offering this remarkable piece at a special introductory price of $15,000. This opportunity not only allows you to acquire a high-quality product but also supports our ongoing efforts to innovate and deliver excellence. Please let us know if you would like to discuss further details or arrange a viewing. We look forward to potentially welcoming you as a valued member of our community.", "product_price": 15000}
